summary: THE PASSENGER SEAT BELT DOES NOT LATCH.  YOU HAVE TO HOLD DOWN THE RED PRESS BUTTON TO LATCH.  ONCE LATCHED THE SEAT BELT ALARM CONTINUES TO CHIME LIKE IS DOES NOT RECOGNIZE THE SEAT BELT IS LATCHED.  IT'S ANNOYING BUT AT THE SAME TIME CONCERNED IF THE SEAT BELT IS WORKING PROPERLY.  AFTER RESEARCHING ON LINE THERE ARE SEVERAL COMPLAINTS AND THIS SHOULD BE CONSIDER A RECALL.   *JB
